com.fluidops.iwb.api
Interface WikiStorageBulkService

All Known Implementing Classes:
WikiStorageBulkServiceImpl
@Doc(value="Wiki bulk storage service")
public interface WikiStorageBulkService

Provides bulk operations (like import/export) on the wiki store

Field Summary
static java.lang.String BOOTSTRAP_DIRNAME_PREFIX
           
 
Method Summary
 void bootstrapWiki(java.io.File dir, java.lang.String artifactVersion)
          Import wiki-files within directories matching the following path: dir\"wikiBootstrap"* Name of wiki files are assumed to be url-encoded URIs.
 void bootstrapWikiAndRemove(java.io.File dir)
          Same as #bootstrapWiki(File), but removes each "wikiBootstrap" directory when all contained wikipages were successfully imported.
 

Field Detail

BOOTSTRAP_DIRNAME_PREFIX

static final java.lang.String BOOTSTRAP_DIRNAME_PREFIX
See Also:
Constant Field Values
Method Detail

bootstrapWiki

void bootstrapWiki(java.io.File dir,
                   java.lang.String artifactVersion)
Import wiki-files within directories matching the following path: dir\"wikiBootstrap"* Name of wiki files are assumed to be url-encoded URIs.

Parameters:
dir - the base directory. All directories within this base directory with a prefix of "wikiBootstrap" are searched for wiki pages to import
artifactVersion - a version string indicating for instance the name and the version of the solution artifact or the software component

bootstrapWikiAndRemove

void bootstrapWikiAndRemove(java.io.File dir)
Same as #bootstrapWiki(File), but removes each "wikiBootstrap" directory when all contained wikipages were successfully imported.

Parameters:
dir - see #bootstrapWiki(File).
